entry.source: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220002}I messed up again. Waste of a perfectly{F801}good plug...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220002}I messed up again. Waste of a perfectly{F801}good plug...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220003}Hm? What do you want? Oh, hold on{F801}a second...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220003}Hm? What do you want? Oh, hold on{F801}a second...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The old demon replaced a part from the{F801}convulsing man...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The old demon replaced a part from the{F801}convulsing man...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220005}Oh, it's one of Tonankai Trade's.{F801}All their products are such junk.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220005}Oh, it's one of Tonankai Trade's.{F801}All their products are such junk.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220006}By the way... I don't recognize you{F801}from the applicant list...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,220007}Don't tell me you're here to see{F801}Kenji?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220006}By the way... I don't recognize you{F801}from the applicant list...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,220007}Don't tell me you're here to see{F801}Kenji?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220008}Ho-ho, you came to see him in person?{F801}Aren't you a bold one.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220008}Ho-ho, you came to see him in person?{F801}Aren't you a bold one.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220012}Then could you leave? I have a quota{F801}to meet.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220012}Then could you leave? I have a quota{F801}to meet.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220010}It's a dog eat dog world. Good luck,{F801}now. Eeh heh heh heh...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220010}It's a dog eat dog world. Good luck,{F801}now. Eeh heh heh heh...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220014}Another failure. The plug missed its{F801}mark...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220014}Another failure. The plug missed its{F801}mark...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220015}...Hm? Weren't you just here...?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,220016}I'm probably just imagining it.{F801}But could you leave? I'm busy.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Old demon\0{F87A,-146}{F813,0,220015}...Hm? Weren't you just here...?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,220016}I'm probably just imagining it.{F801}But could you leave? I'm busy.{F801}
